author: Samantha Sharf
title: Avoid Awkward Money Moments With These 10 Tips - In Photos: Avoid Awkward Money Moments With These 10 Tips - Forbes
text:
Avoid Awkward Money Moments With These 10 Tips
We like to believe that friendship and finance have nothing to do with each other. But in reality, unmitigated economic differences can cause awkwardness in the best of circumstances, and resentment in the worst. Whether you make more than your firends or less, there are steps you can take to soften the blow of common interactions surrounding money.
By Laura Shin and Samantha Sharf
For more see: “ A Tale Of Two Incomes: How To Handle Having More Money Than Your Friends ” and " A Tale Of Two Incomes: How To Handle Having Less Money Than Your Friends "
